title: Naturopathic Care to Promote Self-Healing of the Whole Person
cleaned_text: - Renton M-F 9am-1pm / 3pm-6pm Saturday massage by appointment Naturopathic care uses a variety of natural medicines and treatments to heal illness and improve health. Naturopathy is founded on the concept that people are naturally healthy, and that the body has a strong ability to heal itself when obstacles to good health are removed. The foundations of natural health are diet, nutrition, homeopathy, physical manipulation, stress management and exercise. Naturopathic doctors (ND) are highly trained professionals, with a doctorate in naturopathic medicine and a license to practice issued by a state government agency. Naturopathic physicians treat the whole person by getting to know their individual physical, mental, spiritual, emotional, genetic, environmental, social and other factors. Naturopathic physicians practice six fundamental principles of naturopathic medicine. Your doctor may discuss possible causes for your condition, such as poor diet, stress factors in your life, and occupational hazards.
